attributes.action: ask Ed Balls to speak out about the recent sacking of Prof David Nutt in support of Alan Johnson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Secretary of State for Children, it is appropriate that Mr Balls send a strong message to the kids that drug use is not acceptable in today's Britain, despite recent statements by Prof Nutt.

rejection.details:
There are already a number of similar petitions on the site: 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Back-Prof-Nutt
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Reform-ACMD/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/govtcowardice/

We also believe your petition may be intended to be humorous.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
